review:
Mine was a high risk pregnancy because of my age (38yrs) and past 2 miscarriages. And I am so grateful  that I found Dr. Vinutha during this journey of mine. Right from day one she has worked with me on lowering my anxiety and instilling me with positive thoughts. These close to 9 months weren't easy for me but Dr. Vinutha made sure that we monitor my health and baby's growth regularly. To complicate matters further, I developed gestational diabetes and chloestasis both of which were caught early because of her careful listening and observation. I was rest assured that I am in safe hands. I had Dr. Vinutha's constant 24X7 support on phone and when I told her about my Cholestasis symptoms, without any further delay she took a call to put me on steroids which helped my baby strengthen her lungs and mature the other organs too. At around 36 weeks my precious lil daughter came into this world. For this precious lil gift I will forever be indebted to Dr. Vinutha.  She's like a champion warrior and I am so glad I found her on my side during this uphill battle.

Few more pointers which set Dr. Vinutha apart from everyone else are: 

She is passionate about helping the mom to be and can think from their perspective. **** *********** ***** *** ***** **** ***** ** ** ****** ** ****** ******** 

She has always been very  receptive to what I had to say and clarified our doubts at each and every step. 

Can't put this in any other better way, but money is the last thing  on her mind. Mother's and baby's care is of topmost priority. She is basically a friend and a guide who will make this important journey stress free and smooth for you. 

I highly recommend Dr. Vinutha to each and everyone who wants to
enjoy this special phase of their life. 

One last tip for all moms to be, pls do watch Dr. Vinutha's video on Facebook so that you also can be prepared for step by step development of your baby during your pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),Treatment of polycystic ovarian syndrome(PCOS),
review: I was consulting Dr. Vinutha for PCOS and irregular periods. One day I had a sudden episode of severe lower abdominal pain and blackout. I went back to Dr. Vinutha as my physician suggested a pelvic scan. Dr. Vinutha found that I had an ectopic pregnancy and it needed urgent care and monitoring. As my beta HCG levels were lower than 1000, she suggested to continuously monitor the beta HCG levels every 48 hours and personally monitored me and gave her personal number to reach out in case of even slightest discomfort. She had explained us in detail about ectopic pregnancy and the risks of rupture within the tube and complications. While i was doing ok for a week, I had another episode of severe pain and blackout. She immediately asked me to admit in emergency and started monitoring my vitals every 30 minutes and kept assessing if I need a surgery as there was internal bleeding. She monitored me whole night for every 30 minutes and that gave me a lot of reassurance as I went with lot of pain and was very scared. She monitored my bp, pulse, hemoglobin levels and conducted scans to see if the internal bleeding was increasing. All this was done throughout the night and she was in constant touch with me and the nurses who were attending me. However, as my vitals were stable and my blood count didn't fall further, she assured that I will be alright and don't need a surgery as that would lead to further recovery period and it was not needed in my case. She gave us the option to decide and strongly recommended that we don't get the surgery. Although we were very scared, we trusted her and we are happy we did so. After 2 days of monitoring, she discharged me and explained how I should still expect some pain and also monitor my beta HCG every 48 hours. Now after 3 weeks, my beta HCG has gone down below 30 and my pain has reduced. I am feeling completely alright and all this without a surgery. I am thankful to Dr. Vinutha for her right advice, her utmost care, friendliness and her reassurance when we needed the most.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ******* ********* ** *** **** ****** ** **** **** **** ******. This is my second delivery. Due to a bad and sad experience of my first delivery elsewhere, searched a lot and finally got to know about Vinutha Doctor. The first meet with her made us feel like this is the doctor to go for. Been 9 months and I delivered a baby boy with all effort, concern and care of the doctor. We are a happy couple with two kids, but just to go to her again, we feel like having an other kid. 

The doctor is very professional, powerful at the hospital, while also being friendly, humble, simplicity and caring which is kind of contradicting to each other. She does not give you unnecessary tablets, different growth powders (previous experience), no unnecessary scans, no dramas, and very affordable and very very approachable. We have even called her at night sometimes and she provided necessary suggestions. Just her words "Nothing to worry" was my huge strength.

Finally we got admitted to cloudnine hospital for delivery and the doctor helped deliver our baby through c section (first baby was also c section). The second day I had breathing issues (since I am not comfortable to ac and windows were closed) and immediately made sure necessary medication is given. The third day I was up and running. It's rare to say this about the doctor, but I miss seeing her regularly after the delivery. After the delivery I wanted to see her face first as there is someone there to care for me . 

Today is the forth day after the operation and I am walking and talking normally and writing this review. In my previous operation, I took 20 days to recover like this.

Thank you Doctor Vinutha, you are Divine as your clinic name says and one can trust you blindly. God bless you always and we thank you for every support you gave us :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I approached Dr. Vinutha for the first time in the month of July, 2021 (i.e., in my sixth month of pregnancy). I visited her in Cloud Nine hospital, Kanakapura branch. During the first visit itself, I came to know that doctor is very polite and friendly person. This helped me to have a comfortable interaction with the doctor throughout this pregnancy journey. Whenever I visit the doctor, she always gives enough time to address whatever the queries I had. First she always listens to me with utmost patience and then answer all my queries very clearly and concisely without creating any confusion.

When I came to know about my gestational diabetes, doctor explained me everything related to that without scaring us. She also suggested to follow a proper diet (directed us to a very good dietician) and make me believe that it can be controlled easily by following a diet without going for the medicine. She asked me to monitor the sugar levels (if possible) on a weekly basis (at first) and twice/ thrice in a week during the later stages of my pregnancy. I used to send my sugar levels to the doctor by watsapp and she used to guide me through watsapp only. This helped to keep my sugar levels very much under control till my last day of the pregnancy without taking any medicine. She was just a phone call away for any queries I had.

She always used to tell me to do yoga, walking and pregnancy exercises to have a normal delivery. Even if I tell her saying it will be difficult for me to do the exercises during my 8th and 9th month, she used to motivate me by providing the mental strength to do the exercises. Of course, it helped me a lot during my pregnancy journey. 

Finally, I am blessed with a beautiful baby GIRL in my 40th week of the pregnancy (it was a normal delivery). A big thanks to Dr. Vinutha for providing all the help, guidance, care and assistance during this wonderful journey of my pregnancy. 

I know this is a lengthy post, but can't help as I wanted to express my sincere gratitude for Vinutha ma'am (that's how I used to call her) for being there in this beautiful journey. THANK YOU VINUTHA MA'AM for making this journey beautiful.

I would highly recommend Dr. Vinutha Prashanth for the pregnant women.
reply_text: Thank you , god bless you and your baby

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Glad we found her for my delivery. she guided us step by step throughout pregnancy *** ***** **** *********** ********* ** ********** *********** ****** Also did not call us to her clinic unnecessarily. 

One of the highlighting features of the clinic is there is facility to collect sample for tests like CBC, double marker etc and they send the sample to the lab to get it checked & collect the reports. once the results are available, the doctor is kind enough to verify it and we would get a call from clinic about the update. And we used to collect reports only during next visit. This helped us in avoiding unnecessary movement to labs, especially during covid 2nd peak time. (Also it saved my time, myself being a working professional)

During each of the visit, she always listened to my silliest doubts / questions patiently and never got angry or irritated. She always explained why each of the test she is prescribing is needed and what is happening in the process of my pregnancy. She was always very frank and honest and didn't give any false hopes. She was always available to calls or whatsapp for any issues; its rare to see such a surgeon so easily available to her patients! 

Mine was a planned c-section due to some complications. Though i was mentally prepared for the operation, when i saw OT, i started to panic. Glad that she spoke to me and made me comfortable. Also during my stay in the hospital, she ensured to visit me once a day and motivated me to get back to normalcy ASAP. She didn't let me simply lie on bed (which my family wanted me to) and asked me to start walking, be active. This has really helped me to bounce back, i feel; it has not made me feel like a patient but a mother! 

Would highly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were searching for a doctor who is simple and insists on Normal-delivery over the C-Section and that is when we found out about Dr. Vinutha Prashanth through Practo and Google, we are really happy now that we chose her. We found the adress of her clinic (Divine Women & Child Speciality Clinic) and visited her and we were impressed with the way she listened to everything with patience and explained in detail on how our pregnancy journey will be for the months to come, so we decided that she is right doctor for our requirements. She is very patient and explains everything in details. She is very prompt to answer the call and respond to whatsaap messages immediately if we have any concerns or queries. We had a very possitive journey of 9 months in her guidance. She never gave us any unnecessary medication and she always encouraged us to gain the required proteins and vitamins naturally through the food we consume. In our case, unfortunately the water broke and we had to go for C-Section. The water broke in the morning and we immediately called the doctor and she advised us to visit the hospital, by the time we reach the hospital, she had informed the nursing staff over there to complete the primary checks and update her. She rushed to the hospital as soon as possible and examined me and our baby thoroughly and advised us to get admitted immediately. Through the regular scans we had noticed nuchal cord or Cord-Around-the Neck of the baby was present and since the water had broken our baby was facing few difficulties (heart beat used to drop occasionally and then it used to get back to normal) so we did not have much time to wait for the natural labour pain to occur. She gave us lot of courage and she was monitoring the situation closely and was very patient to wait for almost 10 hours after my water had broken. Since things did not work the way we wanted we had to take the decision to go for C-Section. One thing that makes Dr. Vinutha stand out from the rest is the combination of patience, knowledge and the caring nature that she has towards people who consult her. We highly recommend Dr. Vinutha Prashanth.Thank you so much for making our pregancy journey so beautiful and we really appreciate all your support and guidance provided during our pregenency journey.

review:
Mine was a unexpected conception at the age of 36.....I was worried about the conception and decided to do away with the pregnency as it was unplanned and i had hectic work schedule.
I was searching for the doctor online, We came to know about Dr. Vinutha after some online searches. She came highly recommended and decided to contact her.
After explaining my concern with doctor, she convinced me to go ahead with the baby. She was also highly empathetic and deeply concerned about the health of the mother to be.
. We followed every suggestion made by her and had a very hassle free and enjoyable pregnancy experience. She was always available over the phone for any immediate concerns throughout the pregnancy. During in person consultation she would give ample time, ask us if we have any query or doubt. She doesn't recommend any unnecessary procedure or tests and always gives a valid reason behind any test she would ask to get done. 
I tested Covid positive and as per scanning my baby had delayed growth on 8th month of pregenncy, but vinutha had given hopes on not to worry on baby growth and everything would be fine. Her positive attitude made us to relax.
Since i had breach presentation baby we had to go ahead with C section.
I delivered healthy baby boy on 4th of June with a assistance of Vinutha,she took care of me well till the time i get discharged from hospital.
 Our baby is 15 days old and healthy. 
We would like to thank doctor from the bottom of our heart for her guidance and support.she will be available for patient support 24/7.
 We highly recommend her to all the expecting couples, high risk pregnency who are hunting for good obgyn.

Thank for wonderful women and doctor for all your support.

Regards
brunda naveen.

review:
‚ÄúTen little fingers, ten perfect toes, fill our hearts with love that overflows.‚Äù--Miacle birth of "Bantu"

I had a multiple polyps in uterus , doctor suggested to operate to get  concieved but before operating 
I got to know I am carrying :) on sept 17 2020.Initial days of pregnancy i was consulting doctor in my home town.
When I decided that I will be delivering in banglore,my friend has suggested Dr.Vinutha.As she stays far from my place we were in dilemma whether to go or not initially .By god's grace we thought to meet her first ,she was a active speaker and I got some positive vibes in the first meet .
We decided and we were going for routine checkup in her clinic and she used to tell to do yoga and other excercises to have  normal easy delivery .She was very much confident that I ll have normal delivery but I was ok to have c section if situation demands and pain was uncontrollable.

Finally the day has arrived ,may 1st 2021 ,I had weekly (39 th week)visit with dr.Vinutha  in the evening and we were expecting anytime labour within 15 days but way back to home itself I felt water break , Vinutha madam asked me to check for few hours to go hospital ..then again we were asked to go ovum hospital and check with the duty doctor if I had any doubt of water break .Then at 11 we rushed to ovum hospital and after consulting they wanted to keep me in observation overnight then Sunday morning Dr.Vinutha visited me and told She will deliver today and induced injection to get pain around 8 A.M and I had horrible labour pain I could not bare the pain and requested for c section ,Everyone lost hopes of normal  delivery by seeing my condition.But Dr. Vinutha was very confident about me delivering normally and she was consoling my family and moral support to them at that time.Finally @10 pm may 2 nd i could hear my prince crying.I could only smile and thank  doctors who were with me in OPD.

It's very rare these days to see doctor like Vinutha madam who can take risk  and work for normal delivery .Now everyone tells I am lucky that I got doctor like Vinutha .

review:
Wonderful, Memorable Experience:

Before I write more details in this review, I wanted to thank Dr. Vinutha Prashanth for her help, support, kindness, and care. Thank you doctor, we 3 are grateful that we chose you as our doctor through this amazing journey.

When I got to know I‚Äôm pregnant, we first consulted at a leading hospital near our house. They did the scan immediately, blood tests and confirmed its pregnancy. However from there my night mare started with loads of hormone tablets and injections. I did asked with that doctor why should i be on this hormone tablets, we were not given any acceptable answer.  They also made me to do scans every 3 days in a span of 1.5 weeks. At last i was fed up and was searching for a good Gynaecologist nearby and  i found out Dr. Vinutha Prashanth through google.

I visited Dr. Vinutha first in August and with the first visit itself i was very comfortable and she did spend quality time to listen to me. She infact asked me why am i having these hormone tablets?. She asked me to stop all those hormone tablets and then put me on minimal vital tablets for pregnancy. That itself was a relief for me. From there our journey began with Dr. Vinutha and trust me that was the best decision me and my hubby made. She was available every time  when ever i had questions and supported me emotionally through this entire phase. Her patience to listen to her patients is commendable. My delivery experience was so smooth and she explained us each aspects on time. Moreover she supported me emotionally and also allowed my hubby to be with me during my delivery time. That was a major relief i had and i am always thankful to you Doctor.

Finally a big thanks from me, husband and Izahaak. Doctor, Definitely once he grows up, I am going to tell him this piece of story from my life in which your foot print is firmly affixed.

All the best for you and wish you all the success. Doctors like you are equal to God.

Thanks,
Our Small Happy Family

We visited her in Ovum hospital and our first discussion with her was enough to build our confidence to stay with her for the rest of my pregnancy. We started going for regular check ups at her clinic. Through out the pregnancy, she explained each and every little thing in detail. The various tests carried out were explained elaborately. She never suggested any medicine or test  if not really required. She was very patient with all our queries and tried to clear all our doubts and concerns without any hesitation. She was always available either through call or in person. Dr Vinutha gave me confidence and fully supported my decision to go for normal vaginal delivery. 
In my 37th week of pregnancy, my water broke without any pains. I immediately contacted her and rushed to the hospital, and within no time she was available to help me handle the situation. Even though I didn‚Äôt get any contractions, she assured me that she will try her best to give me a normal delivery. I was induced with pain and after 22 hours of long labour I delivered a healthy baby boy through vaginal delivery and all thanks to Dr. Vinutha who never lost hope on me. 
I would highly recommend Dr. Vinutha for the way she guides her  patients through out the process, supports them with honest suggestions, helps them to build confidence in handling any situation and her friendly approach. Thank you Dr Vinutha for all the help that you provided us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I am feeling very happy to share my experience with Dr.Vinutha. 
Due to COVID situation and this being my first pregnancy, I found it challenging to get a good Gynecologist. Finally during my 3rd month, I found one with whom I consulted throughout my pregnancy. 

The doctor I was consulting suggested Ovum for delivery and had given me a due date. However, we had to rush to Ovum a week earlier to the given date due to an emergency. This is when things went haywire because our doctor was on a vacation and out of Bengaluru for next few days. Myself and my husband went into panic mode instantly and this is when our doctor suggested us to take help from Dr.Vinutha. At this juncture, we were completely clueless and worried about next steps. It was already 6PM at that time.

Just after a single phone conversation with Dr.Vinutha, all my doubts/anxiety were cleared and with her assurance I was ready for delivery in next few hours. It was not just me, but my husband also received similar assurance and positive messages from her. Delivery itself was very smooth and memorable experience. Post delivery, Dr.Vinutha's suggestions and care helped me take care of baby and myself seamlessly. Although my interactions with Dr.Vinutha were only for few hours before delivery, due to her cordial interactions I feel like I have known her for a long time. 

I strongly recommend Dr.Vinutha Prashanth for any pregnancy related consultations. Me and my husband are very grateful to her for taking care of my delivery in such a magical way! :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
With lot of negativity around me i started to search for a better hosp in and around BLR for Normal delivery for my wife. *** ******* ********* **** ********* *** *** ***** ******** ***** ******* ********** ** ***** Most well known hosp don‚Äôt keep up the promise most of the time(just my opinion), they say one & they do one, lack of transparency etc.

I was consulting at a small clinic which i was okay till 5/6 months but later i lost the trust in the Dr. who never motivates or talks about normal delivery, she more insisted about C section.

After a thorough research, sleepless google review readings i chose Dr.Vinutha Prasanth. She seemed to have tons of positive review for her Devotion, Simplicity, Transparency.  

On the 1st meet/appointment, we felt very  comfortable with Dr. Vinutha. She ensured that all of our doubts, concerns, expectation were fulfilled that indeed restored the TRUST. She too believes in natural delivery unless if the medical condition requires. Doesn‚Äôt prescribe a medicine, test if not really required. 

Visited for about 3 times before the delivery , with her experience suggested to get admitted after hearing about the early labour symptoms by 38 weeks. Admitted wife, after 12 hours wife delivered baby girl( Normal delivery üòç). The pre/post delivery follow ups from her are outstanding, she was always available over to phone to help( not sure if all Dr do this) The hassle, the risk that we took all has paid off , a simple thank you wouldn‚Äôt justify her effort. 

Over all a wonderful experience, i would recommend Dr. Vinutha for both women & child care, it‚Äôs worth all your time even if you have to travel from long distance, in my case it‚Äôs was electronic city. 

Sorry about the long narration, i know how bad someone would be looking for a good Doctor & Trustworthy Hosp, user review. I have been there. 

A BIG Thanks again to Dr. Vinvutha
God Bless you more Doctor !!üôèüèº

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review:
During the initial days of my wife's pregnancy we met a couple of Gynecologists, we were not satisfied with them either because they were not spending enough time with us to sit and explain or because they were too pragmatic in their approach and were interested in tests rather than the people sitting in front of them. We came across Dr. Vinutha Prashanth based on a recommendation from a friend who had been visiting her for some time. When we met her for the first time we were very impressed, she clarified all our queries, listened to our problems and took her time to explain and clarify each one of them, she explained the changes that my wife will be going through and what to expect next. We decided that she was going to be our doctor for this pregnancy. This is our first child and we were many times scared and confused. She has been calm and patient with us throughout this pregnancy, from the 3rd month till post natal care. She took her time to explain every single query that we had (even trivial and insignificant ones), never in a rush to look at the next patient. She even answered our calls or messages at odd hours.

Dr. Vinutha helped delivered our baby, it was a normal delivery. My wife went into labor in the middle of the night, even at this odd hour she was there when we arrived at the hospital and looked at my wife immediately. And throughout the night she was either present in the hospital or was taking continuous updates from the duty doctor. She was continuously monitoring on how my wife was progressing, baby's health and kept the OT ready in case of any complications. By God's grace everything went well, both the mother and the baby are doing fine. I have Dr. Vinutha to thank for helping us sail through this beautiful (and sometimes tough) period.

context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
In my 32nd week, based on a friend‚Äôs recommendation for high-risk pregnancy cases, I visited Dr. Vinutha. Our first consultation yielded a positive response due to her excellent attitude, approach, and handling of our case. Dr. Vinutha avoids unnecessary medications and scans, even discontinuing some medications I was unnecessarily taking.

I was dealing with a history of abortions, hypothyroidism, and gestational diabetes, along with being on rest during pregnancy, Dr. Vinutha discussed the pros and cons of both vaginal and C-section delivery. She highlighted the risks of waiting until the 40th week and other potential complications. Experiencing false labor pain at the end of the 37th week, we opted for a C-section on that day, and Dr. Vinutha expertly managed the process. My baby girl was born at 4 pm, and even after delivery, Dr. Vinutha maintained constant communication, addressing problems and doubts. Her follow-up continued even after I returned home.

Dr. Vinutha‚Äôs expertise ensured a smooth delivery, ending my five-year wait to become a mother. We are eternally grateful to her. Thank you, ma‚Äôam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
* We have been consulting Dr. Vinutha right from our pre-pregnancy days. She gave us detailed explanation of what we had to understand when it comes to conceiving.

* She explains the changes that happen to mother's body and the baby at each month.
* No unnecessary medications or scans or tests.
* She makes us understand that pregnancy is a beautiful and a natural journey in any woman 's life. And that it's not a disease.
* She emphasizes on eating healthy and having a normal and active lifestyle

* All my doubts were cleared even before I could ask them, as she would explain each and everything herself even before we could ask any questions.
* She explains the pros and cons of everything

Dr vinutha gives in her 100% for normal delivery.
* While this is the case, she also made me understand when C-sec would be required.
* Thus I was mentally prepared for both.
* She clearly explains the pros and cons of different procedures involved in delivery.
* She made me mentally strong at each consultation.

* She responds to calls and messages very quickly.
* She is very friendly and approachable.


* We feel very fortunate to have met her.
* We're extremely grateful for her help and can never forget the care she has showered on us .
* We'll miss visiting you ma'am and talking to you. Loads of love to you .

review:
It was my first pregnancy. And my journey went very well and smooth only because of Dr. Vinutha Prashanth ma'am.. She's an intelligent doctor with human values.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Based on Practo reviews, we chosed Dr. Vinutha for the pregnancy checkup from the 1st trimester. After our 1st consulatation, we were very much satisfied with the way she conveyed about the process. She is very friendly, down to earth and always gives clarity about each process. Also she makes sure that your money is not wasted on the unnecessary scans/tests.  Going further, we got to know that the fetus is small from the growth scan and we were nervous on the outcome but doctor really encouraged and strengthened us. She took complete responsibility and regularly monitored the growth of the fetus from 7th month till end of 38th week with regular scans and NST tests only when required. The fluid was reduced in 37th week and she still tried her best to push the delivery to 38th week to make sure that baby shouldn't have further complications after delivery. She tried her best for the normal delivery by inducing pain but since I did not get pain, I opted for the c-section. With Gods grace and with such a wonderful Doctor, I'm blessed with a Baby boy on 6th October. Myself and baby both are doing good now. I would really thank Vinutha mam from my bottom of the heart for such a wonderful experience throughout this journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our journey with Dr. Vinutha mam started in February 2022 when I was 6week pregnant and met her first time. This was my first pregency. We had choosen her from online reviews and gone with a positive hope but which was worth it today. She always welcomes with smile. During nine months of pregency i had a normal checkups, scans and no complication. She will suggest only tests and scans required based on individuals. She focus more on normal delivery rather than going up for c-sec. Labour pain started at 12am but waited in home some hours then went to hospital. Actually I was shouting at the top of my voice but doctor didn't lose patience and she made me to understand about the situation. We mentally fine opting c-sec because I was not able to control the pain. But she is not ready to go for c-sec when normal delivery is happening. At last by God's grace and doctor's advice I delivered a baby girl with normal delivery on 9th of September 2022. We are very happy with the things doctor deal with and make us more comfortable. Thanks to Dr. Vinutha mam and team of cloudnine for making the smooth delivery. Loads of love from our family‚ù§Ô∏è

At each stage mam explained in detail why each test was carried out why each prescribed tablets were given what are the probable risks and how she is making sure that the  all risks are assessed.

review:
We went to cloudnine for our 2nd baby and met Dr Vinutha, and from the first appointment itself we felt we were in safe hands..she clarified all our initial doubts we had, and instilled good confidence in us.. we thought since it was our 2nd baby we knew how its going to work but it wasnt the case.. every bit of pregnancy was different than the first one... and Dr Vinutha helped us through out...  to make it smooth sailing..
Doctor was reachable at any time we had called and suggested us for issues appropriately.
We had tooth ache problem in first trimester and lot of gas/digestion issues too..
Coming to delivery itself.. as we expected normal delivery Dr did took us through that path to have normal delivery from the beginning suggesting
 diet/exercises/yoga etc. On the previous day of delivery as well.. we saw little blood spots and did go to hospital to check..and later in the evening pain started and as per dr suggestion we got admitted but
 we had thought we can come to hospital if pain increased but we were wrong.. good that we got admitted on dr suggestion.. as during that pain coming to hospital would have been more difficult.
 I can safely recommend Dr Vinutha to my friends/family or anyone who's reading this  - Dr Vinutha is "go to person" :) .
 Thanks Mam for all the support and making our child birth memorable journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
past 11years, we  have consulted several doctors  at almost all fertility centers in Bangalore and  I had 3  failed IVF cycle,  we were finally suggested  to go for survogacy however by  that'time We were drained both emotionally and financially. we decided to not to go for further treatment and try naturally and i had two miscarriage both natural conception. i again conceived in 2020 but the fetal heart beat was not seen. this is the time when We approached Dr. vinutha for  second opinion. 

dr. explained in detail and suggested to go for DnC because there was no point in continuing since the  fetal heart beat was absence. further she motivated us and told us that there is a good chance of getting pregnant after DnC.
we did not wanted go through iui and ivf treatment again. she suggested few medicine and  supplements. with in an year i conceive naturally.

from day one she gave special attention to me and she explained all risk factors and necessary tests at different stages....she was always a Phone call away for any queries.....only requiered scans and blood test and medication were suggested...
We are now blessed with baby boy in early aug 2022

Thank you so much from the bottom of hearts for making big difference in our life. You are truly an angel sent by god on the earth. I‚Äôm lucky to have met you. May God bless you with good health and happiness.

Pallavi Omprakash

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Visited doctor Vinuta at cloud nine hospitals after looking at online reviews about her. Had previously visited another private hospital where the gynecologist was only concerned about money and treated pregnancy as some kind of disease. But, when we visited Dr. Vinuta, she neatly explained everything and how I could be my normal self with mine considered to be as low-risk pregnancy. She was extremely friendly and made us feel extremely comfortable. She motivated me to be active which was very helpful during my labor. Though I was very much active and did every exercise that I was asked to, during pregnancy, I didn't get pains. As mine was considered to be low risk pregnancy, doctor was willing to wait for 40 + 5days. Unfortunately, the pain didn't come naturally and my induction was scheduled on 40 + 5th day. After 33 of on and off pains, the frustration of not being able to progress further led to the decision of opting for C section. But, doctor Vinuta wanted motivated us go for normal delivery and didn't want our effort of having a normal vaginal delivery to go in vain. With her motivation, guidance and determination I was delivered my baby boy normally after 38 hours. üòÑ for anyone out there looking for **** gynecologist for your motherhood journey, she is the one! Very thankful for you, doctor! üòá

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited dr Vinutha Prashanth by going through the reviews in google for the first time since my wife had gestational diabetes. We were very much worried.

We consulted her in her 27 weeks and in the first week of our visit itself she explained us very clearly about the complications without scaring us. 

We understood that it can be tackled easily with proper diet control and simple methods which doctor suggested us. She introduced us to dr Babitha who was an endocrinologist to help us tackle diabetes.

Dr Vinutha gave us lot of confidence and we are now blessed with a baby girl who was born without any complications with the help of Vinutha doctor

We are ever great full to her for her support and friendly nature which made us very comfortable to talk openly and contact her anytime of the day if we faced any issues

Even in a high risk pregnancy she recommends normal delivery only and she recommends natural diet rather than artificial supplements.

We highly recommend dr Vinutha Prashanth for people looking for a good and friendly And approachable doctor

Thanks
Jagadeesh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Before I met Dr. Vinutha, I was really anxious about my pregnancy. Since the first consultation,  she has always put me at ease. All my queries were patiently answered and she took her time to understand my case history. Throughout the course of my pregnancy, I was not put through any unnecessary scans, lab work or medications. All I had to do was practice Yoga and take a few supplements. That's it !! Whenever I had late night panicked moments I would Whatsapp the doctor and she would always get back to me. She always instilled the confidence that I was healthy and the baby was developing well. Such positive reinforcement helped me tremendously !!! When it was time for me to deliver the baby, she was there coaching me through the entire process and we welcomed our lovely baby girl <3. I had a normal delivery and it was seamless. However, as luck would have it, I had postpartum hemorrhage. Dr Vinutha and her team quickly swung into action and contained it. Throughout the recovery, be it 11 am or 11 pm, she was constantly checking up on me. I couldn't have asked for a better doctor to take care of me through my pregnancy and post delivery. My deepest heartfelt gratitude to her!!! I 100% recommend Dr Vinutha :)

review:
First of all I would like to thank Vinutha ma'am for all the support and guidance that she has provided me in my entire journey of pregnancy, I will always be grateful to her. 
I found out about her when I was going through the reviews of cloudnine hospital, Kanakpura road. All the positive reviews about her made me very confident to consult her and I'm glad about the decision I made.Consulted her at Divine clinic,Banashankari. She never recommended any unnecessary scans or medications.Explained the necessity of every scan and blood test very clearly before getting it done. She is very approachable. She would reply to all the queries anytime of the day without any delay. Very friendly doctor, treated me like one of her  family members which made me very comfortable.  Coming to the delivery part, I got admitted to the hospital in the midnight at around 12:30. She came to the hospital and kept monitoring my condition the whole night and finally delivered baby girl in the morning at 5:55,it was a normal delivery. Very difficult to find such  doctors these days and I'm lucky to have found one.
Happy to recommend her to all the expectant mothers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was my second delivery and I would recommend Dr. Vinutha to every women who needs a positive delivery experience. She throughout handheld us with confidence and was extremely empathetic and very understanding. Not to exaggerate but just like how a mother or an elder sister would behave, she was extremely friendly and explained us in detail what needs to be done and what not. She avoided unnecessary scans unlike others and prescribed scans only when required. Ask any number of questions to her and raise your concerns, she will be extremely patient and clarify your doubts in detail. 

 I also want to tell that during internals, she was extremely patient, understanding and did not hurry up and gave time. 

Also during labour, she kept giving confidence and was very respectful even when i was not cooperative, she with her comforting words helped me brace the situation. 

This review is no where exaggerated. She is extremely service oriented and i had the best delivery experience. She delivered our beautiful baby girl and I'm more than grateful to her for all that she has done through our pregnancy journey, through labour and delivery. She is certainly one of a kind ‚ù§Ô∏è

I would recommend her to every body i know. Not one complaint from my side. Just heartfelt gratitude from my family to hers. 

May her tribe of doctors grow üòä‚ù§Ô∏è

review: "Your baby is not different my baby is not different " these were the exact words Dr.Vinutha said to me during one of my consultation visits and she does go by what she says. She takes utmost care and is very responsible when it comes to her patient. Mine was a high risk pregnancy and we did have to go through a few tough situations during our journey but Dr.Vinutha made the path easier for us by taking all the worries on herself. She doesn't treat her patient as a 'case' but takes it personally and makes sure that she is very well aware of the condition of the patient. Many doctors nowadays aren't available during odd hours rather they give the contact of hospitals to connect with in case of emergencies but Dr.Vinutha is available 24 X 7. Its very rare to find such dedicated doctors who do not commercialize their service but do it out of sheer will. I am really thankful to Dr.Vinutha for bringing joy into our life and will always be greatful to her. She definitely is the most recommended doctor especially for high risk pregnancy.

review:
The name Divine itself explains everything & Dr. Vinutha Prashanth madam is the replica of it.
Our pregnancy journey started with a confirmation from the doctor & the whole journey was just amazing. Without any hesitation we would definitely recommend the doctor to any couple planning for a pregnancy. She's open to all questions/doubts and explains each & every bit in detail without losing her calm at any point of time.
The best part of Dr. Vinutha Prashanth madam is that she makes us feel as a family and no doubt we treated her as our family member & expressed whatever we wanted to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My journey with Dr. Vinutha started at Divine Women & Child Speciality Clinic with beginning of my second pregnancy and this journey of nine months was beautiful and memorable for me. During all my consultations, my queries were answered promptly to my satisfaction. Lab tests and scanning was prescribed at regular intervals to access the growth of my baby.

Considering the pandemic situation, I was guided to choose and opt the right hospital for delivery keeping in mind the safety of my baby.After 39 weeks of my pregnancy, I got labor pain and had to rush to hospital in wee hours. In no time, Dr. Vinutha reached the hospital and was beside me. She kept motivating me and within an hour, I delivered a healthy baby boy normally (without vaccum or forceps usage) and I was extremely happy to see my baby in her safe hands.

I liked Dr. Vinutha for her patience, politeness, reachability, expertise and passion towards work. She is a wonderful human being God has created who helps to bring the  bundle of joy into this world and I would like to thank her again for all the care and love she has shown me.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Vinutha to my friends and relatives.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
We strongly recommend Dr Vinutha Prashanth for the below listed reasons.
1. She develops enormous trust with the patient and family right from the first conversation.
2. She listens to understand our concerns and patiently explains the issue at hand, potential root causes, the recommended solution and alternatives, potential risks/side effects of the chosen solution, and next steps in the direction of cure
3. She is available on phone for any clarification, small or big - Knowing that the doctor you are consulting is a message or a call away is a big win for anyone.
4. She is very well mannered, extremely soft spoken and retains composure at all times - Hallmark of a top notch professional
5. She delivers on her promise of the best in class treatment
6. She continues to check in on the progress being made and does so with unfailing regularity.

Dr Vinutha is the gynaecologist we all need and deserve. You choose her and are in the safest pair of hands.

I, my wife and family have nothing but gratitude to express to her service.

Note: We had an issue accidentally diagnosed via an MRI and later confirmed through an ultrasound scan. This required a open procedure that Dr Vinutha and team performed two days ago. This review is written after we got discharged on Wednesday, 9th June

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As soon as I saw signs of pregnancy, we started to search for a good Gynic near my house and came across Dr. Vinutha Prashanth's review in Practo and Google.
Since this is my first pregnancy, I went to her with loads of questions in my mind. In my first visit I was happy that my selection for a good Gynic was not wrong, she patiently answered all my questions in her clinic and asked me to send her a message if I have any other doubts, this made me feel very comfortable and secured.
*** ** *** *** *** *** ********** *********** ****** ********* ** ************ ****** she prefers more of exercises and natural foods. From day one she motivated me for a natural delivery and made sure that my every visit to her clinic was fruitful and I step out with a peaceful mind. She allowed me to select the lab I wanted to get my scans done and never forced me to visit anyone in particular.
Unfortunately, during my delivery I had to face some complications, even then she was the one who boosted my morale and made sure that I didn‚Äôt lose hope and helped me to deliver a healthy baby.
We heartfully thank Dr. Vinutha and can blindly suggest her name for anyone who is looking for a good Gynic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are very happy that we chose Dr Vinutha madam despite of lots of suggestions from family/friends to go for different hospitals.We visited Vinutha madam in the month of September 2020 for pregnancy check up and from the very first consultation we made up our mind that we will continue with divine clinic and not to go any other hospital.

Every month it used to be very smooth process as doctor is very friendly and understanding, she explains everything in clear ways and suggests only the necessary tests and medications, she always advised me to be active and keep doing daily household chores and yoga and to eat properly. 

With proper guidance of Vinutha madam there were no complications throughout the pregnancy and we are blessed with a baby boy last Thursday. 

Baby‚Äôs heart beat was not really good during the contractions and I was not able to tolerate the pain, but doctor insisted and encouraged for normal delivery even in OT, with the prompt efforts of dr Vinutha and team finally at 1:43AM it was a normal delivery on the surgery table just before they start the c section procedures.
Thanks for all your support and guidance throughout the pregnancy till delivery madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted Dr.Vinutha from 6th month of my pregnancy, I did find her on practo and her reviews made me to go to her, she has been supportive through out the journey being available 
on watsapp and call for any query. She asked us to send reports by watsapp and explained reports on call , avoiding unnecessary visits in the covid time. My baby had late stage IUGR and was monitored every week in the 8th month for his growth, which would make me feel tensed but 
her words always assured me that my baby is ok, and will be delivered with no problem. I being obese never ever thought that I will have a normal delivery and also with my baby having IUGR, 
I considered c-section is the only go, but doctor Vinutha always gave me a hope of normal delivery.
I cannot thank her enough for her care and concern, when I was admitted instead of just asking duty doctor how i was, she herself visited me every 4 hrs to check upon me.
 I did not have any pain though whole day had passed, but Dr.Vinutha patiently waited and her patience with me is commendable, when I didnt deliver even by night 11PM,she decided to stay back in the hospital for me all night long. I delivered my baby normally the next day early morning.
All thanks to Dr.Vinutha. I would suggest her to anyone looking for a caring supportive doctor for their journey of Pregnancy.
reply_text: Rajani, thank you so much, ur words are valuable to me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our first visit to Dr Vinutha Prashanth was for a routine checkup at pre-concieving stage. We went through a few gynecologist profiles for consultation and surprisingly found that Dr Vinutha had the highest review. It was one of the best decisions made to consult her! The whole 39 weeks went like a breeze. Dr Vinutha is very supportive and available 24x7 for any doubts. Touchwood, the whole experience of pregnancy was really good until last few days wherein I had few common issues like stuffy nose, body itching. She made me go through it very easily. On the day of admission, after two unsuccessful attempts to induce pain, we decided to opt for a c-sec. It was the best decision collectively, as the baby was on the healthier side(~4kgs) and the fluid content was high. She did not give false hopes about delivery procedure and explained every step and possibilities in detail.In a nutshell, the whole experience with Dr Vinutha is a blessing for us. I would certainly recommend her with utmost confidence for a pleasant and enjoyable pregnancy. Thank you doctor! üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
After a lot of research and reading multiple reviews we started consulting Dr. Vinutha (with a bit of apprehension though). This was our first baby and as a new parents to be we had a lot of questions and we found Dr. Vinutha during the lockdown and she happened to be answer to all our questions and taking away our apprehensions too. She had been very informative and guided us in the right direction throughout the pregnancy phase. Although there weren't much of complications but we were still worried about normal delivery in the world of c-section. Dr. Vinutha had been very pleasant and she was approachable and available whenever we needed help/assistance. Based on how she guided us shows the enormous knowledge and experience she carries in her profession which is to be seen in very few who are in the same profession as her. Finally the day arrived and I was admitted at Ovum - Banashankari. It took a humongous effort and time before my daughter arrived, a lot of patience shown by Dr. Vinutha was commendable as she did not rush me to the labor or advised me to get a c-section for a less painful process. Instead she took all the efforts and showed a lot of patience for over a day before she finally delivered my daughter. The kind of patience and efforts taken by Dr. Vinutha was commendable, our family and I are very happy with the way the whole process went through. Thank you Dr. Vinutha!
Regards,
Prathima and Raja

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Tests,Labor and Delivery,
review:
My wife had been delivered by Dr.Vinutha Prasanth just about last week, We strongly wanted to go for normal delivery and in the proces had to change almost 4-6 doctors as we didnt confide in any of the doctor who would respect our wish, Some acquanitance referred Dr.Vinutha syaing she tries cent percent for normal so visited during jst about 3 weeks before our due date. 

She is truly dedicated to the medical profession and gives her 100 cent  in safeguarding mother,child health during,before and after childbirth. she is an embodiment of true medical practioners who we used to see people like her during our childhoold  In today's corporate world even where medical providers are deemed as businesses,After meeting with Doctors like Vinutha it reminds us what is the true sense of medical profession and still true doctors exist.

In my wife's case she genuinly tried for normal delivery, After induction of Lobor our child's position was not coming to still in the pelivic floor(even after 12 hours of labor pains)so she explained us the pros and cons for further waiting and asked us to decide what she has to do, so to be on safer side we decided to go with c-section. 

Finally my wife was shifted to OT, Then after 30-40 minutes i was able to hold my little princess in my hand. We would vouch for Dr anytime.
reply_text: Anil,  Thank you for understanding . Infact , I sincerely gave a trial for normal delivery , due to unavoidable circumstances,I had to caesarean section.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am really thankful to this hospital specially Dr Vinutha. I was wanting normal delivery from beginning. 40th week Dr Vinutha had done internal checking which was very painful for me. My water broke before labour pain started. Dr Vinutha suggested she would wait for pain to come. Now when actual labour pain started I lost my confidence of going for normal delivery completely as the pain was too severe. I requested the doctor also that the pain is very severe and I would like to go for cesarean delivery. However Dr Vinutha checked my bp and baby heart rate also which was normal. Dr Vinutha recommended to wait for pain to come fully and give time to dilate fully. Anyway after 8 hours of pain I could delivery my baby successfully through normal delivery only which I think could not be done without support from Dr Vinutha. I feel she is one of a doctor who would wait for the last moment before going for cesarean. Nobody could ignore the benefits of normal delivery as I could start walking from next day and hold my baby. My special thanks to Dr Vinutha though at time I also thought she was too strict to go for normal delivery when I had requested for cesarean, however at the end of the day that really helped me to recover so quickly.
reply_text: Sudheshna u are a wonderful girl.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnant,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
Married for about 10 years now, having a child was not on our top of our priority list. By the time it reached the top, we realized we have had a minor problem. One fine day we just dropped in not knowing what to do or whether to trust anyone these days especially while the medical scams are making patients poor and medical practitioners prosperous. Our journey with this genuinely concerned doctor started there.

We really felt like We are being listened too and understood. She doesn‚Äôt come over with a preconceived notion about the patient and their problems and as if she automatically knows what is best for us.

She took time to address our concerns in way that acknowledges our feelings but also presented us with the ground reality and practicality.  She educated us about what to expect, what was considered normal, and what to look out for during each appointment. She never made us feel uncomfortable or bad for asking so many questions. Every time we met her she made us feel like we are her only patient. And every other of her patients we met had same opinion about her.

Her staff also represent her well.

When I tell you she is an amazing doctor I‚Äôm not lying. I seriously would follow her anywhere. You can‚Äôt find more of a genuine soul and doctor that truly cares about your needs. We were sure that we were in good hands from the get go. We are terrified of having to find a new obgyn.

Hard to find all of these qualities in an Doctor these days at the price point Hundred times of her professional fees!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ** **** ******* ** ** ****** ****** ** ********** ************* ****** *** ******** *** **** *** ***** *** ** ******** ***** **** *** ******* ** *** *** ******* ** *** ** **** ** *********** ** *** **** ********** ****** ******* ** ***** *** ******** ****** *** *** ********** ** *** ** ** ** *************** one of our friend suggested us Dr Vinutha Prashanth at Ovum hospital. Her personal number was available online. She was very cordial and professional. She assured us that her first preference is to have normal delivery. She also explained us the circumstances where we have to go for C-section. Whenever scanning is to be done outside, we were sending the report through WhatsApp and she was giving her advice, thereby avoiding having an appointment with the doctor and going to the hospital.

We had normal delivery at Ovum hospital which was done by Dr Varna Rao, again excellent doctor and human being, as Dr Vinutha Prashanth was out of station. Our experience with Dr Vinutha Prashanth was excellent and we thank her and Dr Varna Rao for their support and service.She was available at any time over phone for clarifications which made us feel comfortable staying at house.On the delivery date (which happened 11 days before due date) she was out of station and Dr Varna Rao did the normal delivery. Throughout the delivery process constantly in touch with us and the doctor and ensured that everything went fine. Immediately on return from out of station, she directly came to hospital to see the baby and mother. It was like having a close friend to treat us instead of some doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited doctor Vinutha as l was ailing with heavy menstrual cycle. Later through scanning  it was concluded as endometrial hyperplasia. 
The first visit was brief,through reports  doctor made me understand my condition,
And suggested me, the probable solution  as D and C ,hysteroscopy and mirena insertion...
I was worried with my condition, but doctor comforted me with words saying  this is a common problem nowadays..
The provisions of medicine is also an added aspect at the clinic....
Following medications...the d day of treatment arrived, doctor was busy but she ensured to respond when ever l messaged to clear my doubts. 
Doctor is considerate enough of patients  expenses too..
Madam suggested me apt hospital for the treatment...the doctor was in Time for the surgery even though she was in out of station previous day...
Didn't get annoyed with me over messages.
After the treatment, l m still in contact with doctor for follow on...she guides me 
I even asked for referrals, the doctor is kind enough to respond to my query ...
Thanks doctor Vinutha Madam for this considerate,helpful, reach able,reliable approach.l am satisfied with the treatment l recieved..l have suggested  her for my relatives 
too.

Even after delivery she was monitoring me each and every day till my discharge. I strongly recommend Dr.Vinutha Prashanth not only for pregnancy but for all the women's health problems.

review: We visited her from my 7th month pregnancy onwards. She spent more than 30min to understand who I was, what my history and my pregnancy journey. I had iron deficiency, and I was unable to take iron orally.  She provided me iron shorts at right time. She is specialized in providing patient specific treatment instead following same approach for every one. On my 35th week scan we discovered that I had placenta previa means my placenta was very close to opening so I can't go through normal delivery but with her guidelines and changes in my diet with in 2 weeks span all parameters came to normal and we pushed for normal delivery. And at the time of delivery due to some complications I gad to go through cesarean at that time She guided us properly.  She is very friendly and remember each and every detail of main even she had lot other patients which was surprising part.

review:
We had been to a few gynecologists, but didn't have a good experience. 
One of our friends recommended Dr. Vinutha Prashanth. We visited her clinic once we got to know we're expecting. She was very patient from the beginning. Always explained what needs to be done, what she is doing and why she is doing. She also used to answer every question we had, and responded asap whenever we sent a message. 
Since we were having twins she explained in detail all the issues we might face and was there to guide us through the process.  We had to go in for an emergency C-section, and she arrived to the hospital immediately to perform the surgery. We could not have asked for a better doctor, and have already started suggesting her to some of our friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was my 2nd pregnancy and there is development delay for my 1st son which made us more scared on 2nd pregnancy, during that time when we were looking for hospital many suggested cloud nine and when we reviewed in google for which Gynecologist to consult we saw there was good feedback about Dr. Vinutha and we decided to consult.

She is an amazing doctor from the 1st trimester till date post delivery too she is being great support, as we were in a state where there is development delay for my 1st son, she was so concern on my pregenancy suggested for all possibility of test to ensure no risk factor for 2nd baby and was very supportive.She explain everything in a clear manner. She give a postive vibes during each visit.  The day of delivery came which was like a surprising feel where it was a normal delivery within 45 min, the way she had taken care was really great will never forgot in my life time.

I would suggest Dr. Vinutha for all.

review:
I had my initial pregnancy consultation with Dr. Vinutha. My wife (Anagha) and I extend our heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Vinutha for being a part of the delivery of our baby boy. Despite the high tension on the day of delivery, we felt at ease and confident in the knowledge that she could handle any situation that may arise. Dr. Vinutha's ability to discern when to be serious and when to inject humor made a significant impact on our experience. We are eternally grateful for her guidance and care from the beginning of the pregnancy until delivery.

Throughout the pregnancy, Dr. Vinutha was instrumental in explaining to us what was required and how to care for ourselves and our baby. She always prioritized the patient's well-being by recommending the best course of action rather than unnecessary medication or scans. During our visits, she demonstrated extraordinary patience in explaining every aspect of my pregnancy and provided us with the necessary reassurance. She was always available to support us and never pushed for a C-section, unlike some of the doctors in Bangalore. Dr. Vinutha even went above and beyond by checking up on her patients during her free time.

We highly recommend Dr. Vinutha's services to anyone in need of a competent and compassionate doctor.

review:
visited Dr. Vinutha after reading so many positive reviews online. It turned out to be one of my best decision. Previously I was visiting another doctor who suddenly suggested an immediate laparoscopic surgery for my condition and had caused a panic situation in my family.
But visiting Dr. Vinutha made us feel at ease after she explained my condition very clearly and assured us it is not a situation to fear. She was very humble, patiently listened to all our queries and answered them in a soothing tone. She patiently explained the pros and cons of getting the surgery done immediately and gave us time to decide. Meeting her just once released all the tension and filled us with positivity.
We decided to go ahead with the surgery. Dr. Vinutha helped me go through the whole procedure with ease. She addressed all my concerns patiently and timely even in between her busy schedule. Surgery went very smoothly and I am extremely grateful to Dr. Vinutha. üôèüòä
I am lucky to have found such a wonderful gynaecologist and I whole heartedly recommend her. The clinic is very clean and at a great location. The receptionist is also a very sweet and welcoming personüòä (very refreshing after experiencing rude receptionists in other clinics).

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
We came across Dr.Vinutha‚Äôs name from a family friend and after looking into all positive reviews we decided to consult. From our first visit she made us feel completely comfortable with her. Extremely friendly and easily approachable with just WhatsApp messages.

On the day of delivery visited cloud nine hospital for NST as per Dr.Vinutha suggestion as I was having few contractions previous day. After seeing the report she was not satisfied and asked us to get NST with IV. She was in constant touch with duty nurse to get updates. Within few minutes she came to hospital as she felt heart beat was not good.

She suspected that baby could have passed meconium and explained us about breaking water to check. Unfortunately baby had passed meconium and heart rate was dipping drastically. She took a right call for emergency C section and within 20 minutes we were blessed with baby boy.

We are so grateful and thankful to Dr.Vinutha. A gem of a person who is so caring and understanding. 

Thanks for being there with us!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife is one of the patients of Dr. Vinutha Prashanth. 
But the story is one of my cousin's. They were actually not consulting Dr.Vinutha from the start.
They are from nearby village in Tumkur. When my cousins wife suffered amniotic fluid loss in her 33 week of pregnancy due to intermittent medical conditions, it was an emergency when he called me. 
I forwarded the report to Dr. Vinutha and she suggested immediate medical support required and asked to rush the patient to Bangalore. It was around 9.30PM on 16th Mar 2020 and they came to Bangalore by around 1 AM next date. Dr. Vinutha was there right away and gave all required medical support and she advised delivery the same morning as the baby looked tired. We went with her suggestion and I am happy to tell you today both baby and mother are doing good.
This is a success story only because our Doctor's timely advise, clarity in thinking and the support she extended when most required.
I admire her courage to accept the challenge when many others had a second thought, as there was no historical data available at that time as they were not her patient.
Dr. Vinutha Prashanth, you are a wonderful by heart, service oriented, down to earth, friendly *** **** *********** **** ************* ****** who can make common people understand medical situations and advise to take decisions with lot of clarity.
Thank you very much!!
reply_text: Ur words are inspiration to me sir, thank you so much

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Mine was Twin pregnancy case with high risk complications. When I approached Dr. Vinutha @29 weeks , by that time my second baby was not alive in the womb which we were not aware and because of it my BP levels were abnormal. She conveyed the message to me as a family member and asked to admit in the Hospital to monitor and save me as well as my baby. She was checking my health situation on an hourly basis with the staff. She was such a wonderful doctor who has taken care of the patient issue as her own issue.  She extended my delivery to 34 weeks with continuous monitoring of Dopplers and blood tests. At last In 33 week 4 days, they did delivery to me. Initially first baby has some respiratory problems with low weight 1280 grs. She has admitted in NICU for a month. OVUM NICU staff and Doctors did a good job in speedy recovery of my baby. By the time of discharge, my baby was 2000 grs and very happy to see my baby at home playing with her parents & near and dear.
Today am having one baby that is purely because of Dr. Vinutha. She did a tremendous job which is countless. We are always thankful to her for the support of pre and post delivery. She is such an amazing doctor with lots and lots of patience. 
We really love you and miss you..Thanks much for your support.

review:
I met Vinutha mam for a second opinion on cervical cerclage. She said it's not required and prescribed oral medication. There was no turning back from that time. I believed her completely in all stages of pregnancy. She was motivating me for normal delivery in all the visits. Also, there was no unnecessary scans suggested. 

During my 37th week scan we found out that my AFI had dropped to 4.9 which could be riskier for baby. She suggested immediate delivery on the same day. I was shocked and crying. She consoled me and explained the risks if we have waited further. We opted for lcls and our bundle of joy was with us all healthy in the evening ‚ò∫Ô∏è

She is always available over WhatsApp and answers all the queries and in emergencies you can call and talk to her. Thanks a lot to her for the wonderful service she is offering.

During our 5th month scan we had a abnormality and was scared about Childs growth. Doctor gave us confidence and counselled us on the report and she asked us not to worry about it.. now we are really happy that we have a healthy baby..!!! Even during my delivery I was little panic and nervous but doctor was continuously talking and made me calm‚Ä¶ I would highly recommend Dr. Vinutha for pregnancy delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Before I begin, I would like to thank Dr. Vinutha for addressing the long outstanding issue.
I was suffering from excessive & irregular periods which not only impacted my well being but resulted in drop in hemoglobin and subsequently weakness. While I visited several other hospitals and the cure suggested (not getting in to details) were not satisfying. 
 
That's when we visited Dr. Vinutha where she not only explained the root cause (harmone Imbalance) but described how Mirena process can help us. I went thru Hysteroscopy along with Mirena process which has overcome the problem described above. I would like to thank Dr Vinutha once again for overcoming 4 years old problem. I strongly recommend people to visit Dr Vinutha as needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have decided to visit Dr. Vinutha after seeing many positive feedbacks. After our visit we were convinced that we found the right doctor for our second pregnancy. Dr. Vinutha is highly professional, easily approachable(shared her contact number to reach in case of any doubts/emergency), and very caring with her patients. She listens to the patient's concerns and explains the treatment/process in simple terms. No unnecessary medicines and supplements are recommended.  In case of any complication in pregnancy she will explain the issue and the treatment required in detail. We are very happy to get treated by Dr. Vinutha, and strongly recommend her.P.S ‚Äì We were blessed with a baby boy on 3rd Sept-2021 at  Cloud9 Kanakapura branch, both baby and mother are healthy. Entire process from hospitalization to discharge went smoothly. Thanks Dr. Vinutha and Cloud9 staff for taking care of both Mother and Baby.
